title: The Decisive Battles Of World History -  Gregory S. Aldrete
description:
The Great Courses : The Decisive Battles Of World History

36 lectures  
30 minutes each 
2014
MPEG-3 
128 Kbps, 44.1 KHz, 2 channels 
English 
0.99 GB


Synopsis: Nothing changes the world as quickly and inexorably as war. In warfare, the future course of entire civilizations, regions, and continents can be determined in as little as a few hours.
